description: Looking to get lifted while still eating healthy, then this is your dish.
title: Baked Lemon Chicken
ingredients:
3 tbsp CannaButter, melted

4 chicken breasts

⅓ cup chicken broth

4 tbsp fresh lemon juice

1 tbsp honey

2 tsp garlic, minced

1 tsp Italian seasoning

salt and pepper to taste

fresh rosemary and lemon slices for garnish
directions:
1. Preheat oven to 400°F and grease a baking sheet or large casserole dish.

2. Melt CannaButter in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add chicken and cook chicken 2 - 3 minutes on each side just until browned. Transfer chicken to prepared baking sheet.

3. In a small bowl, whisk together chicken broth, lemon juice, honey, garlic, Italian seasoning, salt and pepper.

4. Pour sauce over chicken. Bake 20 - 30 minutes until chicken is cooked through. Every 5 - 10 minutes spoon the sauce from the pan over the chicken.

5. Garnish with fresh rosemary and lemon slices, if desired, and serve.

description: The perfect dish to combine your dream of breakfast and cannabis. Start your day off right.
title: Belgian Waffles
ingredients:
1 ½ cups CannaMilk

(optional) 1 tbsp Cannabis-infused maple syrup per waffle

1 ¾ cup all purpose flour

2 tsp baking powder

½ tsp salt

1 tbsp white sugar

3 large eggs

7 tbsp vegetable oil
directions:
1. Preheat your waffle iron before starting to mix the batter.

2. In a large bowl, whisk together the flour, baking powder, salt and sugar.

3. Make a well in the middle. Break the eggs into the well and beat lightly with a fork. Add the oil and CannaMilk and stir until moistened.

4. Using a spoon, put the batter into your waffle maker and cook until golden and crispy.

(optional) - Add Cannabis-infused maple syrup.

description: What is every football party missing - cannabis! Spice up your next party and show everyone how to really enjoy the game.
title: Buffalo Wings
ingredients:
2 tbsp CannaButter

1 cup CannaMilk

32 oz oil (for frying)

1 cup all-purpose flour

2 tsp salt

½ tsp pepper

½ tsp cayenne pepper

¼ tsp garlic powder

½ tsp paprika

1 large egg

3 chicken breasts (skinless, boneless, & cut into ½ inch pieces)

4 tbsp hot sauce
directions:
1. Heat oil in a deep-fryer or large saucepan to 375°F.

2. Combine flour, salt, black pepper, cayenne pepper, garlic powder, and paprika in a large bowl.

3. In a separate bowl, whisk together the egg and milk.

4. Dip each piece of chicken in the egg mixture, and then roll in the flour blend.Do this twice so that each piece of chicken is double - coated.

5. Refrigerate breaded chicken for 20 minutes.

6. Fry chicken in the hot oil.Cook until the exterior is golden brown, and the juices run clear, this should take around 5 - 6 minutes.

7. Combine hot sauce and butter in a small saucepan.Heat sauce on medium until melted.Pour sauce over the cooked chicken;mix to coat.

description: Gummies that will have you pondering the reason your did not try this sooner.
title: CannaGummies
ingredients:
½ cup Cannabis-infused coconut oil

½ cup cold water

3 oz packet of flavored gelatin

2 tbsp plain unflavored gelatin

½ tsp sunflower / soy lecithin
directions:
1. Turn your stove on low heat. In a pot add the water, Cannabis-infused coconut oil, and sunflower/soy lecithin.

2. Continue stirring the mixture until it has a consistent texture and the coconut oil has completely melted. Now, add in the flavored gelatin and the unflavored gelatin while continuing to stir throughout this process.

3. Whisk extensively on low heat for 10 - 15 minutes until the gelatin is completely dissolved. Make sure it does not come to a boil; make sure that all the ingredients are thoroughly combined.

(note) - Do not stop stirring this mixture for the entire 15 minutes.

4. While leaving the pot on low heat, start filling up the gummy bear molds with a dropper (a dropper is a mini turkey baster that comes with most gummy bear molds).

(note) - Make sure to move quickly. If your liquid starts to separate, it's because the mixture has started to cool. It's critical that you move fast otherwise the oil may separate in the pot. You need to continue whisking throughout the pouring process otherwise the mixture may start to harden and stop binding.

5. Put the gummy bear molds into the freezer for 20 - 25 minutes.

description: The classic American dessert, which will have you coming back for more. Pair with CannaMilk for the ultimate treat.
title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
ingredients:
1 cup CannaButter

3 cups all-purpose flour

2 cups chocolate chips

1 cup white sugar

1 cup brown sugar

2 eggs

2 tsp vanilla extract

2 tsp hot water

1 tsp baking soda

½ tsp salt
directions:
1. Preheat oven to 350°F.

2. Cream CannaButter, white sugar and brown sugar together in a bowl, then beat in eggs. Stir in the vanilla.


3. Dissolve baking soda in hot water then add to mixture.

4. In a separate bowl, sift flour and salt; stir into butter mixture. Finally add the chocolate chips.

5. Get a baking tray & cover it in parchment paper. Place cookies with large spoonfuls of dough on the tray, evenly spaced apart. There should be about 24.

6. Bake for about 10 minutes in the preheated oven, or until edges are nicely browned.

(note) - Slightly undercook for soft and gooey cookies.

description: The cliche edible for every stoner. Enjoy the rich fudge flavors, while you get lifted.
title: Chocolate Fudge Brownies
ingredients:
5 tbsp CannaButter

5 tbsp unsalted butter

4 oz bittersweet chocolate

4 oz semi-sweet chocolate

2 large eggs

1 cup granulated sugar

2 tsp vanilla extract

¼ tsp kosher salt

1 cup cake flour, sifted
directions:
1. Preheat the oven to 400°F.

2. Grease a 9 x 13 inch baking pan with regular butter and line with parchment paper. Grease parchment paper and set pan aside.


3. Melt the chocolate over a bain marie. 

(bain marie) -  Place chocolate in a heatproof bowl and heat on top of a pot of hot water.


4. Combine the regular butter and CannaButter with the melted chocolate over a bain marie. Cook, stirring, until melted and smooth, about 5 minutes. Remove from heat and set aside.

5. Whisk the eggs together in a large bowl. Add the sugar, vanilla, and salt and whisk to combine. Stir in the chocolate mixture and fold in the flour.

6. Spread the batter evenly into the prepared pan and bake until the brownie forms a thin skin on top but the batter is still loose in the center, about 18 to 20 minutes.

7. Transfer the pan to a rack and let cool completely before slicing.

description: Cookies, cheesecake, and cannabis … can it get any better?
title: Cookies & Cream Cheesecake
ingredients:
2 tbsp CannaButter

1 tbsp butter

24 of your favorite cookies

divide 3 (8 oz) Philadelphia cream cheese packets

¾ cup sugar

1 tsp vanilla

3 eggs
directions:
1. Preheat oven to 330°F.

2. Place 16 of the cookies in resealable plastic bag. Flatten bag to remove excess air, then seal bag. Crush cookies by rolling a rolling pin across the bag. 


3. Place crushed cookies in a medium bowl. Add regular butter and CannaButter, mix well. Press firmly onto bottom of 9 inch springform pan.

(optional) - Replace the regular butter with CannaButter if you desire an increase in the potency of the muffins.

4. Beat cream cheese, sugar and vanilla in large bowl with electric mixer on medium speed until well blended. Add eggs, 1 at a time, beating just until blended.


5. Chop or crush remaining 8 cookies. Gently stir half of the chopped cookies into cream cheese batter. Pour batter over prepared crust. Sprinkle top of batter with the remaining cookies.

6. Bake 45 minutes or until center is almost set. Let cool. Refrigerate overnight.

description: A simple, yet tasty twist on an Italian dish everyone loves.
title: Garlic Parmesan Pasta
ingredients:
2 tbsp CannaButter

2 tbsp unsalted butter

1 lb angel hair pasta

salt and pepper, to taste

7 garlic cloves, roughly chopped

¾ cup Parmesan cheese
directions:
1. Melt the butter in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the garlic and cook until light brown, 3 - 5 minutes. Remove from the heat and set aside.

2. Bring a large pot of generously salted water to a boil. Add pasta and cook, stirring occasionally, until al dente, about 5 minutes. Drain it, reserving ½ cup pasta water.


3. Return the pasta to the pot you cooked it in and add the garlic, butter, salt, and pepper.

4. With a large fork and spoon combine the ingredients well, then add a ½ cup of the grated Parmesan cheese and the pasta water and continue to combine gently.

5. Transfer the pasta to a large platter and top it with the remaining Parmesan.

description: So versatile it can be used on most of your favorite dishes.
title: Guacamole
ingredients:
1 tbsp CannaOil

2 avocados, peeled and pitted

1 cup tomatoes, chopped

¼ cup onion, chopped

¼ cup cilantro, chopped

2 tbsp lemon juice

kosher salt and ground black pepper, to taste


(optional) 1 jalapeno pepper, minced
directions:
1. Mash avocados in a bowl until creamy.

2. Mix tomatoes, CannaOil, onion, cilantro, lemon juice, and jalapeño pepper into mashed avocado until well combined, season with salt and black pepper.

3. Serve the Cannabis Guacamole.

description: Great for a pick-me-up on a hot day. Cool down while you get high.
title: Iced Coffee
ingredients:
½ cup CannaMilk

½ cup warm water

2 tsp instant coffee granules

10 ice cubes

½ can (5 oz) sweeten condensed milk

1 tbsp chocolate syrup
directions:
1. In a small bowl, stir together the water and instant coffee.

2. In a blender, combine ice cubes, coffee mixture, CannaMilk, sweetened condensed milk, and chocolate syrup. Blend until smooth.

3. Pour and enjoy!

description: The ideal drink to enjoy on a hot summer day.
title: Mango Breeze
ingredients:
1 - 2 grams Cannabis

ice cubes

25 oz vodka

3 cups mango chunks

2 ½ oz cranberry juice

2 ½ oz mL orange juice

1 lemon
directions:
1. Preheat oven to 240°F.


2. Grind up Cannabis and place into small ovenproof bowl and cover with foil. Cover the bowl with foil and put it in the oven for 35 minutes.


2. Once the Cannabis has finished decarboxylating, transfer it to a small container and pour in some vodka until the Cannabis is covered and soaked. Cover the container and store it in the fridge for 24 hours (up to 7 days) to infuse the vodka.

(note) - The longer the mix stays in the container, the more potent it will become.

3. Strain the Cannabis-vodka mix into a blender using cheesecloth and discard the plant matter.

4. Add the mango chunks, cranberry juice, and orange juice to the blender with the crushed ice, then slice the lemon and squeeze out the juice. Blend the ingredients until smooth.


5. Serve in a glass with ice

description: Tequila and cannabis … what could go wrong?
title: Margarita
ingredients:
1 oz Cannabis leaf juice

25 mg Cannabis tincture

Cannabis leaf, edible flowers, or greens of choice, to garnish

1 oz tequila

1 oz aquavit

¾ oz lime juice

¾ oz agave syrup

1 pinch sea salt
directions:
1. In a shaker filled with ice, combine the tequila, aquavit, lime juice, agave syrup, green juice, salt, and Cannabis tincture.

2. Shake, then fine strain into a lowball glass with one large ice cube.

3. Garnish with a Cannabis leaf, edible flowers, or your favorite greens.


4. Serve immediately.

description: When chocolate, cannabis, and peanut butter come together, great things happen.
title: Peanut Butter Cups
ingredients:
½ cup CannaButter

6 tbsp cocoa powder

6 tbsp powdered sugar

4 tbsp powdered sugar (sifted)

½ cup peanut butter
directions:
1. Prepare a cupcake tin with 6 liners.

2. Melt the CannaButter over a bain marie. 

(bain marie) -  Place CannaButter in a heatproof bowl and heat on top of a pot of hot water.

3. Once the CannaButter has melted, sieve in the cocoa powder & 6 tbsp of powder sugar.

4. Stir on low heat until the ingredients have completely mixed together. Mix thoroughly until there is consistency. Turn the heat off but leave the pot on the stove.

5. In a separate bowl, stir all of the peanut butter and powdered sugar together until smooth.

6. Spread 1 tbsp of the Cannabis chocolate mixture in the bottom of each cupcake liner.


7. Dollop 2 tsp of the peanut butter mixture on top of the chocolate. Cover each dollop of peanut butter with 1 more tbsp of chocolate and smooth out the top.

7. Refrigerate for 1 hour or until chocolate has hardened. Remove peanut butter cups from the liners & enjoy!

description: Show you local diner how to make a proper milkshake with this innovative twist.
title: Strawberry Milkshake
ingredients:
1 ½ cup CannaMilk

4-7 grams Cannabis

1 can (13.6 oz) coconut milk

2 cups milk

12 oz strawberry ice cream

2 frozen bananas

1 cup frozen strawberries

3 tbsp maple syrup

1 tsp vanilla extract
directions:
1. Preheat your oven to 245°F and line a baking sheet with foil.


2. Grind your Cannabis onto the baking sheet and bake it for 20 - 25 minutes.

3. After the Cannabis is done baking, remove it from the oven and set it aside.


4. Put a saucepan on the stove over medium heat, pour in 2 cups of milk, add in the Cannabis and let it simmer for 40 minutes while whisking occasionally.

(note)- Be careful not to boil as it will degrade the potency of your cannabis mixture.

5. Strain the CannaMilk into a jar using a colander lined with cheesecloth. Discard the plant matter and store in the fridge to cool.

6. Add the coconut milk, CannaMilk, ice cream, bananas, strawberries, maple syrup and vanilla, and blend until smooth.

7. Pour your milkshake into a mason jar and store in the fridge for several hours until it’s chilled and creamy.

description: You can’t go wrong with cobbler. This is the perfect dish for you next summer party.
title: Summer Berry Cobbler
ingredients:
1 cup CannaButter, softened


16 oz strawberries, sliced

12 oz blackberries

6 oz raspberries

6 oz blueberries

2 cups all-purpose flour

1 tsp baking powder

1 tsp salt

½ cup light brown sugar

2 tsp vanilla extract
directions:
1. In a large bowl, mix together flour, baking powder, and salt. Set aside when evenly combined.

2. In a large bowl, beat together CannaButter, sugar, and vanilla using hand mixer or standing mixer. Mix until smooth.

3. Combine dry ingredients to CannaButter and sugar mixture. Slowly mix until mixture consists of pea sized crumbles.

4. In a 9 × 13 inch baking pan, layer mixed berries. Add crumbled dough evenly across fruit.

5. Bake in the oven at 375°F for 30 minutes until golden brown.
